Name: Manual Intervention VR
About the game: Manual Intervention VR is a real-time, sci-fi planetary defence game, exclusively for VR headsets. Orbit around 3D moons and planets and defend the ground colonies by firing missiles at the incoming bombs. Unlock weapons and tools to gain a strategic advantage. Features Fifteen levels of challenging gameplay, told through an intriguing sci-fi story and full colour comic strips. Exciting 'Tech' upgrades that evolve the gameplay, including Overdrive, EMP, Disruption, and Hack! Designed for left or right handed VR controllers, or comes with gamepad controller support. Supports HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, and Windows Mixed Reality.
